statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -1 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -1 \\ 6 \\ 8 \\ 10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 11 \\ -5 \\ 18 \\ 20 \\ 22 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
